snippet: The Lifetime TV channel says it has ordered a drama pilot based on the best-selling works of the author of "The Clan of the Cave Bear."...

headline.print_headline: Lifetime Orders 'Clan of the Cave Bear' Pilot
headline.main: Lifetime Orders 'Clan of the Cave Bear' Pilot

lead_paragraph: The Lifetime TV channel says it has ordered a drama pilot based on the best-selling works of the author of "The Clan of the Cave Bear."
